name: Finite Quantity of Cows
description:
The Cattle Defence Group (GDC) keeps all of the galaxy's cows secure in platforms throughout the universe. However, they are planning to activate an incredibly destructive event, the Dairy Cascade. 

You play as a space bandit who must steal these rare creatures in order to stop this dasterdly plan.

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 104.

Game looks best in fullscreen.
